title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 165.1 - Scope of part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 165.1 - Scope of part

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish standards and
approval requirements for training providers proposing to provide technical or
vocational programs to dislocated workers pursuant to section 7 of the

Occupational Retraining and Reemployment Act (ORRA). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
165.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
